io.reinert.requestor.core.serialization

Interface Serializer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of serialization
    All Superinterfaces:
    Deserializer<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FormDataSerializerUrlEncoded, JsonBooleanSerializer, JsonNumberSerializer, JsonObjectSerializer, JsonSerializer, JsonStringSerializer, JsonValueSerializer, OverlaySerializer, TextSerializer, VoidSerializer

    public interface Serializer<T>
extends Deserializer<T>
    Performs serialization and deserialization of a type to/from plain text.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<T> handledType()
      Method for accessing type of the Object this serializer can handle.
      String[] mediaType()
      Tells the media-type patterns which this serializer handles.
      SerializedPayload serialize(Collection<T> c, SerializationContext context)
      Serialize a collection of T to plain text.
      SerializedPayload serialize(T t, SerializationContext context)
      Serialize T to plain text.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.reinert.requestor.core.serialization.Deserializer

        deserialize, deserialize

    • Method Detail

      • handledType

        Class<T> handledType()
        Method for accessing type of the Object this serializer can handle.
        Specified by:
        handledType in interface Deserializer<T>
        Returns:
        The class which this serializer can serialize

      • mediaType

        String[] mediaType()
        Tells the media-type patterns which this serializer handles.

        E.g., a serializer for JSON can return {"application/json", "application/javascript"}.
        If you want to create a serializer for any media-type just return "*/*".
        Specified by:
        mediaType in interface Deserializer<T>
        Returns:
        The media-type patterns handled by this serializer.

      • serialize

        SerializedPayload serialize(T t,
                            SerializationContext context)
        Serialize T to plain text.
        Parameters:
        t - The object to be serialized
        context - Context of the serialization
        Returns:
        The object serialized.

      • serialize

        SerializedPayload serialize(Collection<T> c,
                            SerializationContext context)
        Serialize a collection of T to plain text.
        Parameters:
        c - The collection of the object to be serialized
        context - Context of the serialization
        Returns:
        The object serialized.
